dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Synth Fool
dmca.body:
Subject: Many violations
Date: Sun, 18 Nov 2006 07:53:01 -0800
URL: matrixsynth.blogspot.com
ItemType: TOS
Ticket #: 83885888

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signed 11-22-2006:

http://www.blogger.com/comment.g?blogID=17775202&postID=113583044231277270
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/6863/1447/400/id19em.jpg

Modular synthesizer 1 custom built for academy award winner Hans Zimmer.
Original file located here: http://synthfool.com/lightner/?d19.jpg
Copyright for this photo is held by myself, Kevin Lightner.
Photography for this photo was taken by Scott William Lightner (http://www.williamlightner.com)

My email address: synthfool@synthfool.com

My contact info: Kevin Lightner/Synthfool.com
PO Box 201
Wrightwood, CA 92397-0201
760-249-6757

There are many more such inclusions of mine alone.
Requests to this blog owner to remove them met with slanderous posts regarding me and my business.
Using a post entitled "Kevin Lightner wants to sue me", he posted my private emails.
One email was even indicated as "Private email. Do not repost"
These designed to harm my reputation.
He claims he's removed all content, but as you can see, he still retaining such images and has since removed an references.
Some inclusions are sexual as well. (not comments, entire posts)
He refuses to remove these and actively re-copies them back again.
NONE of the photos on his blog are originals taken by him, as far as I am aware.
He apparently travels the web, taking what he wants, then lashes out at the owners if they object.
I was previously the top TOS enforcer for Xoom/NBCi in 2000.
I am very well acquainted with general TOS guidelines and intellectual property claims.
His blog should be removed wholly as he is continually repeating this action.
I can produce URLs and references for at least a dozen examples owned by myself.
I will continue to send complaints to your office for each offense until it becomes obvious what this blog owner is.

Thank you for your time.
